H0.text: Which English producer and screenwriter is responsible for the creation of the fictional school Grange Hill . Russell T Davies

H1.text: Which English producer and screenwriter is responsible for the creation of the fictional school Grange Hill . Jimmy McGovern

H3.text: Which English producer and screenwriter is responsible for the creation of the fictional school Grange Hill . Phil REDMOND

A4.text: Sir Philip Redmond created the fictional school Grange Hill.
